data.name: Tyranny - Official Soundtrack Deluxe Edition
data.detailed_description:
The Official Soundtrack Deluxe Edition for Tyranny includes over two hours of stirring, dramatic music from Obsidian Entertainment composer and audio director, Justin Bell. In addition to the entire original soundtrack, the Deluxe edition includes all-new music from the Bastard's Wound expansion, along with demo scores from the game's development and other never-before-released tracks.

  • 43 Tracks in total
  • Over two hours of original music
  • The complete musical journey from every moment of Tyranny

The following songs are included (mp3 and flac):

  • 1 - Terratus
  • 2 - Kyros
  • 3 - The Tiers
  • 4 - Edgering Ruins
  • 5 - Vendrien's Well
  • 6 - Hall of Ascension
  • 7 - Spires
  • 8 - Binder of Fate
  • 9 - Lethian's Crossing
  • 10 - Oldwalls
  • 11 - Stone Sea
  • 12 - Burning Library
  • 13 - Pillars in the Sky
  • 14 - Apply the Lash
  • 15 - Stand Together, Stand Tall
  • 16 - Undying Fatebinder
  • 17 - Archons
  • 18 - Fatebinder
  • 19 - Blade Grave
  • 20 - Passage of Culling
  • 21 - Sentinel Stand
  • 22 - Twin Rivers
  • 23 - Bleden Mark
  • 24 - Uncommon Ground (Stone Sea Extended)
  • 25 - Effigy (Vendrien's Well Redux)
  • 26 - Trail of Blood
  • 27 - The Cost of Victory (End Slides)
  • 28 - Edicts
  • 29 - Oldwall
  • 30 - Sleepless
  • 31 - Lullaby
  • 32 - Central
  • 33 - Refuge
  • 34 - Stone Sea (Score Demo)
  • 35 - Edgering Ruins (Score Demo)
  • 36 - Lethian's Crossing (Score Demo)
  • 37 - Sky Pillar (Score Demo)
  • 38 - Vendrien's Well (Score Demo)
  • 39 - Stand Together, Stand Tall (Score Demo)
  • 40 - Archons (Score Demo)
  • 41 - Undying Fatebinder (Score Demo)
  • 42 - Apply the Lash (Score Demo)
  • 43 - Terratus (Score Demo)

In addition to the entire original soundtrack, the Deluxe edition includes all-new music from the Bastard's Wound expansion, along with demo scores from the game's...
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9505 @ 2.80 GHz / AMD Athlon II X4 840 @ 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 5770 or NVIDIA GeForce GTS450 with 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8.5 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.5Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6950m with 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q9505 @ 2.80 GHz / AMD Athlon II X4 840 @ 3.10 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 5770 or NVIDIA GeForce GTS450 with 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
